Users and Groups

Lesson
objectives

¢ Describe and manage Users
* Describe and manage Groups
« Use the Team tab

Marci |
Configuration Yam
Developer _.

How can | create and organize users who work
_{ with PolicyCenter?

Julia §
Implementation

You can manage them through Architect We
the community model, which
includes users, groups,
organizations, and producer
codes.

bt

| Users Gi

A user is an individual who interacts with PolicyCenter

Producer

bd Underwriter
. —9

1
@
Cc Supervisor

Auditor

| User types

An internal user is an employee of the insurer
* Can potentially view an external user’s group and permissions
An external user is a person outside the company
* Needs to access PolicyCenter data
* Typically, producers
« Must be associated with an organization
Captive agents are sometimes
* Internal users when they are employees of the insurer or
+ External users who have an exclusive contract to do business with an insurer

Access is controlled through roles and producer codes

Groups ee Gi

Producer

Marci
Configuration
Developer

How to work with users and groups?

| Managing users

* Search, view, edit or create the users using the Administration tab
¢ Every user has details about

* what a user owns for assignment purposes(user type, etc.)

* what a user can access (roles, underwriting (UW) authority, region, etc.)
* Create a new user

+ Administration > Actions > New User

« External users must explicitly specify to which organization they belong

User Access

¢ Turn on/off producer code security (Yes for user type Producer)

¢ User inherits producer code from their group and can add additional producer

codes
User: Frede

rick Dwight

Attributes

Basics

Access || Roles | Profile | Region | UWAuthority

[peresiercose sco vs]

Group details = S™uPs

Group Member Manager Load Factor Permissions Load Factor
Producers ‘Yes
Producer codes Producer Codes from Groups
Code Description Status Groups Actions

To add a producer code
to this user

301-008597 Cid Vicious agency Active

Additional Producer Codes

Code Description Status > Actions

| Managing groups fa
¢ Search, view, edit and create groups using the Administration tab

¢ Any user (internal or external) assigned to a group has access to all of the
producer codes available to that group

Producer Codes tab lists all producer codes assigned to the group

Group: Eastern Mid-West Region

Basics | Users Queues | Regions

Producer codes can be selected here from those available to the parent group

Available Code Description Status Branch
QALPRODUCERCODEO1 Internal Producer Code-2 Active Los Angeles Branch UW

Standard Code Internal Producer Code-1 Active Los Angeles Branch UW

| Demonstration G

Managing users and groups

click here

Note: The demonstration opens a new tab in your browser. When the demonstration ends, the
original course launch window appears. Return to this window to continue this presentation.

Andri
Supervisor

| want to view the activity and job details for the
users within my group and be able to reassign
them.

| Team tab i

¢ Provides a visual management tool that helps supervisors and managers manage
their groups

* Each group can have only one supervisor

« Users in the group can be set as managers
¢ Reports all activities and jobs grouped by time and status
* Can mass reassign the activities and jobs

* Can view policy transactions by role or activity

Gi

View by categories

* By Role — displays jobs where a user is a participant, such as CSR

« May not have any activities associated with job
* By Activity — displays jobs where a user has an activity, such as an underwriter

« An activity makes the underwriter aware that work is required on job
